column5:
Hi Jack Hughes
I was searching for some information on POS software today when I came across your site and found the article in http://techteapot.com/open-source-open-warfare/
Brilliant stuff!
However, I couldn't help but notice that there are many posts mentioned smartstore.net which was outdated. You may have heard that SmartStore rebranded as SparkAnalytics.
You may want to remove all links of smartstore from your website, because they are now broken links.
Also, recently I have published my new solution for POS software, which called Magento POS ipad.
My URL is http://www.magestore.com/retailer-pos.html/
As you can see, my website is really good and will make a nice addition to your blog. Either way, keep up your awesome work.
Thank you,
Bruce Kenway
